example.parse: (S (CONJ و) (VP (PV+PVSUFF_SUBJ:3MS ابدى) (NP-SBJ-1 (-NONE- *)) (S-NOM-OBJ (VP (NOUN.VN+CASE_DEF_ACC اسف) (NP-SBJ (POSS_PRON_3MS ه)) (PP-CLR (PUNC ") (PREP ل) (NP (NP (NOUN+CASE_DEF_GEN ضعف) (NP (NOUN استراتيجيا) (NP (DET+NOUN+CASE_DEF_GEN الاتحاد) (DET+ADJ+CASE_DEF_GEN الاوروبي)))) (CONJ و) (NP (NP (NOUN+CASE_DEF_GEN عجز) (NP (POSS_PRON_3FS ها))) (PP-LOC (PREP في) (NP (DET+NOUN+CASE_DEF_GEN الشرق) (DET+ADJ_COMP+CASE_DEF_GEN الاوسط))))) (PUNC "))))

arg.g: because of the weakness of the European Union strategy and it's deficit in the Middle East
